typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	filename as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Default = '',
		Priorexperience = replace(Priorexperience,'N/A','0'),
		{new_Date of Data collection} = '',
		Certification_date = replace(Certification_date,'-',''),
		filename = 'SME/'+replace($filename,'.csv', '_'+toString(currentTimestamp(),'YYYYMMDD_HHmmss')+'.csv')) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ProjectID as string,
		Context as string,
		{Type of tool} as string,
		{Area of change} as string,
		{Service themes} as string,
		{Date of data collection} as string,
		id as string,
		Course_name as string,
		Username as string,
		Email as string,
		{Phone number} as string,
		Title as string,
		{First name} as string,
		{Middle name} as string,
		{Last name} as string,
		idnumber as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Year of birth} as string,
		{Organization/ Company name} as string,
		{Type of entity} as string,
		{Sub-type of entity} as string,
		{Professional status} as string,
		Functional_title as string,
		Howlong as string,
		Priorexperience as string,
		Address as string,
		Cityname as string,
		Country as string,
		{Country code} as string,
		Pobox as string,
		Postalcode as string,
		Nationality as string,
		Skype as string,
		Aim as string,
		Yahoo as string,
		Msn as string,
		Profile_field_Supervisor as string,
		{Service theme} as string,
		Cityregion as string,
		{Job title} as string,
		Size as string,
		Certification_date as string,
		Certified as string,
		Cohort as string,
		Uniqueid as string,
		User_id as string,
		Enrol_time as string,
		FILE_NAME as string,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'filename',
	mapColumn(
		ProjectID,
		Context,
		{Type of tool},
		{Area of change},
		{Service themes} = Default,
		{Date of data collection},
		id = Default,
		Course_name,
		Username = Default,
		Email,
		{Phone number} = Default,
		Title = Default,
		{First name},
		{Middle name} = Default,
		{Last name},
		idnumber = Default,
		Gender,
		{Year of birth},
		{Organization/ Company name},
		{Type of entity},
		{Sub-type of entity},
		{Professional status},
		Functional_title = Default,
		Howlong,
		Priorexperience = Default,
		Address = Default,
		Cityname,
		Country,
		{Country code} = Default,
		Pobox = Default,
		Postalcode = Default,
		Nationality = Default,
		Skype = Default,
		Aim = Default,
		Yahoo = Default,
		Msn = Default,
		Profile_field_Supervisor = Default,
		{Service theme},
		Cityregion,
		{Job title},
		Size,
		Certification_date,
		Certified,
		Cohort,
		Uniqueid,
		User_id,
		Enrol_time,
		FILE_NAME,
		LOAD_TIMESTAMP
	)) ~> sink1
